Type Property# byParagraphs

iOS 2.0+iPadOS 2.0+Mac Catalyst 13.0+macOS 10.0+tvOS 9.0+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 2.0+

```
static var byParagraphs: NSString.EnumerationOptions { get }
```

## [Discussion](/documentation/foundation/nsstring/enumerationoptions/byparagraphs#Discussion)

Enumerates by paragraphs. Equivalent to [`paragraphRange(for:)`](/documentation/foundation/nsstring/paragraphrange(for:)).
